meanings.sent1: The outspread wings of the bird allowed it to soar effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The blanket lay outspread on the grass for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The outspread map covered the entire table, making it hard to find space for anything else.
meanings.sent4: Her outspread arms welcomed everyone with warmth and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The outspread branches of the tree provided a cool shade on a hot summer day.

meanings.sent1: She outspread her arms to catch the falling book.
meanings.sent2: The cat outspread its claws to climb up the tree.
meanings.sent3: He outspread the map on the floor, accidentally covering his cat.
meanings.sent4: The dancer outspread her legs gracefully during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The runner outspread his arms as he crossed the finish line in victory.
